alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 01 at 11:25PM MDT until August 04 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SCATTERED LIGHTNING FOR SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS, OWYHEE MOUNTAINS, AND WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM... .Storms are expected Wednesday afternoon and evening, leading to a Red Flag Warning for the Southern Highlands, Twin Falls BLM, and the Owyhee Mountains. In addition, a Fire Weather Watch has been issued from Thursday afternoon through Friday evening for all but the NF districts, again due to scattered thunderstorms. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 11 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS, WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423, 424, AND 426... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS, WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM, AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423, 424, AND 426... * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Up to 50 mph.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM
